function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Misinformation fueling health anxiety and impairing health-related decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to address new behaviors and values in recovery packages","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to shape future outcomes through present actions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to turn global health crisis into a sustainable opportunity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising diversity and inequality within and between countries may lead to different levels of focus on sustainable change, creating a potential divide in disease mitigation efforts.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of fossil fuel-dominated economies to adapt to a sustainable path may lead to instability and conflict, impacting disease management and control efforts.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographical diversities and political responses within countries may impact the adoption of sustainable energy transitions, potentially influencing disease prevention efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of a rebound to pre-pandemic ways leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of long-term behavioral and structural change related to fossil fuel demand and air quality.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of political response to warnings of human disaster and resilience in public health and welfare.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linking covid-19 deaths with air pollution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rising air pollution as lockdown eases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in political focus from short-term gains to long-term resilience measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on cars for transportation due to reduced demand for public transport, leading to higher levels of air pollution and increased risk of accidents.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift towards working from home and changes in travel patterns leading to long-term reduction in demand for public transport.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connection between human activity, biodiversity loss, environmental degradation, and health highlighted by the pandemic, leading to increased awareness and urgency for environmental action.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in social practices including in mobility and work practices may lead to persistent shifts in transportation behaviors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced high carbon travel has contributed to covid-19 related emissions reductions, but the persistence of reduced travel demand is uncertain.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Debates in the public sphere about the ’new normal’ and post-covid-19 world may impact attitudes towards green stimulus and sustainable policies.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global response to covid-19 causing strain on resources and infrastructure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changing social and political practices affecting sustainable transitions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public support for action on climate change at all-time high prior to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased decentralization of energy governance from multilateral to national, transnational, and local scales due to the frailty of global cooperation and the impact of covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased government intervention in markets and private life due to the response to the pandemic, leading to potential disruptions in economic and institutional capacities.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sufficient policies and regulatory frameworks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Division within the eu regarding energy transition","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Backtracking of major players on national level commitments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordinated and inclusive global energy governance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in green stimulus policies across countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbated trends towards ’re-shoring’ and localization of energy systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short-term focus on health and livelihoods without considering long-term health and environmental impacts","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on fossil fuels despite evidence of superior economic returns from sustainable initiatives","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate support for cleantech market progress and green energy initiatives","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to large-scale economic activities and investment flows","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate allocation of resources towards public health infrastructure and pandemic preparedness","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discontinuity in investment flows impacting healthcare infrastructure and disease prevention initiatives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High oil and gas prices and volatility resulting from cuts in investment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial practices supporting fossil fuel industries and investments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in fids in lng industry leading to economic impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Plummeting production and rig count in the us shale industry","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential peak fossil fuel demand and demise of fossil fuels accelerated by covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on global supply chains for healthcare products and appliances","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in energy investment due to the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fall in energy demand, especially for oil","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains for energy production facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on pace and nature of whole energy system change","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical price crashes and demand shocks leaving marks on global energy system","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainties about the structure of global energy system in 2030 due to pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases due to changes in social practices and public movements.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Socio-technical lock-ins leading to limited flexibility in transitioning to sustainable energy practices.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
